title: Sausage and oyster stuffing
ingredients: ['450g (1 lb) pork sausagemeat', '450g (1 lb) unseasoned dried bread stuffing mix', '2 (225g) tins oyster pieces, liquid reserved', '250g (9 oz) chopped celery', '1 onion, chopped', '4 tablespoons butter, melted', '350ml (12 fl oz) turkey stock', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'Creole seasoning to taste']
